channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Request a Quote
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Request a Quote

item.title: CVE-2024-6231|2024-07-23T13:25:53.653Z -- unknown -- request%20a%20quote
item.description: The Request a Quote WordPress plugin before 2.4.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-6231|2024-07-23T06:00:02.805Z -- unknown -- request%20a%20quote
item.description: The Request a Quote WordPress plugin before 2.4.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
